name: Confirm Run Instance
description: Look through the source files and update any existing file or add/remove files as needed. Review load instance parameters to confirm they are still correct

name: Build Pipeline Run
description: Bring back last run's source files and source parameters

name: Scan Source Folder
description: Uses the file location of the data source and the current record date to verify that the folder contains all the files required by the source.

name: Download Missing Files
description: Attempt to download any missing files that have a valid download method

name: Collect Missing Files
description: Find all remaining missing files that cannot be downloaded

name: Confirm Record Date
description: Check to make sure the files match the record date and any files that are older should be marked with the collection date

name: Backup Files to Zip Folder
description: System takes all the source files and compresses them to a zip folder

name: Validate Source Tables
description: Check that the source tables have the right options

name: Fix Source Table Options
description: Some source table options have been found to contain errors. Check to confirm the options are correct

name: First Pipeline Detected
description: No past runs of this source can be found. The user must manually enter source files and run details

name: Validate First Pipeline
description: Confirms all required options are set and at least 1 file is provided

name: Analyze Files
description: Analyzes all the source tables marked for analysis within the specified run. Collects the max and min length of the field as well as the field type if supported for the file type.

name: Load Files
description: Loads all the source tables marked for loading within the specified run
